import React,{useState,useEffect} from "react"; import Axios from "axios" const Categories = (props)=>{ const [loai, setLoai]=useState([]); const [cay, setCay]=useState([]); let key=props.match.params.key; useEffect(() => { const fetchloai= async()=>{ const res= await Axios.get('https://5ea1c7f7b9f5ca00166c2226.mockapi.io/conga/sanpham?id_loai='+key) setLoai(res.data); } fetchloai(); },[]); useEffect(() => { const cat= async()=>{ const res= await Axios.get('https://5ea1c7f7b9f5ca00166c2226.mockapi.io/conga/loai') setCay(res.data); } cat(); },[]); console.log(cay);
